title: The Pencil
brief_description: A portrait of the pencil, showing the different types, its manufacture, use and abuse. A fascinating treatment of the subject, beautifully photographed, with musical ‘commentary’. Original electronic music by Georgi L. M. Nachoff and Karol Rattray.
